summary: As a Web Developer, I enjoy the creative challenges of building a web app. I pride myself in writing clean and robust code, that is secure, scalable, and well tested.

I am a fan of all things JavaScript and specialize in building modern web applications implementing the Model-View-Controller architecture, mainly using the MongoDB, Express, React, and Node (MERN) Stack.
Currently, I am looking to transition my set of skills as a hobbyist to a professional and I am actively looking for employment opportunities as a Web Developer.
